sent.orig: The use conical twin-screw extruder, vacuum calibration machine, traction machine, cutting machine, stack machine.
sent.trans: 该机组有锥形双螺杆挤出机、真空定型台、牵引机、切割机、贴膜机、翻料架等组成。
